indications: Mometasone furoate nasal spray is a corticosteroid indicated for: Prophylaxis of Nasal Symptoms of Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis in adult and pediatric patients 12 years of age and older ( 1.1 ) Treatment of Chronic Rhinosinusitis with Nasal Polyps in adult patients 18 years of age and older ( 1.2 )
contraindications: For Nasal Use Only Prophylaxis of Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis in Adult and Pediatric Patients 12 Years of Age and Older: 2 sprays in each nostril once daily ( 2.2 ) Treatment of Chronic Rhinosinusitis with Nasal Polyps in Adults (18 yrs. and older): 2 sprays in each nostril twice daily. 2 sprays in each nostril once daily may also be effective in some patients ( 2.3 )
adverseReactions: Mometasone furoate nasal spray is contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to mometasone furoate or any of its ingredientsÂ [see Warnings and Precautions (5.3), Description (11)].
name: MOMETASONE FUROATE
